item.description:
Understanding the nature of the 3 subtype areas is as important, if not more important, than the Enneagram type. This is designed for  Self-Pres subtypes as well as anyone in relationship to one or just curious about this dominant subtype.

Learn more about Self-Preservations Subtypes, what's important to them and how to relate to Self-Preservation Subtypes in general and well how self-pres relates to the other two subtypes, sexual and social. Valuable for Self-Preservation Subtypes as well as those in relationship to Self-Preservation Subtypes. Option to end at 9:30pm.

 

Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling is an Enneagram teacher/trainer/counselor/expert. He is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and also Herb's Tips for Living (a book of wisdom on how to live a happy and balanced life).

www.herbpearce.com

781 648 3737

herb@herbpearce.com
item.how_to_find_us: Arlington Heights, Corner of Tanager St. and Wollaston Ave.
item.why: Because if you are in relationship to this subtype or you are this subtype, this will greatly support you to be successful in your relationship and personal growth.
item.name: Self-Preservation Subtypes in the Enneagram
